mapper.select: select count(*) from shopBasket where basket_id=#{basket_id} and product_no=#{product_no}

select b.basket_no as basket_no, b.basket_id as basket_id, l.item_no as product_no, '이재형' as user_name, l.item_name as product_name, l.item_img as product_img, b.basket_count as basket_count, l.item_price as price, (item_price * basket_count) sumPrice, validity, basket_page from shopList l, shopBasket b where l.item_no = b.product_no and b.basket_id=#{basket_id} and validity=1 order by b.basket_no desc
